LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.label: 酒精成瘾
LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.description: 长期过量的摄取酒精已经造成了神经系统的适应。\n\n如果没有定期摄取合适剂量的酒精，戒断反应就会开始。长时间的戒断会迫使大脑适应并恢复到正常状态，从而戒除酒精成瘾。
LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.stages.withdrawal.label: 戒断反应
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.label: 醉酒
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.description: 流淌在血液里的酒精，使人快乐，但又让人神志不清。
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.warm.label: 暖和
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.tipsy.label: 微醺
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.drunk.label: 飘飘然
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.hammered.label: 酩酊大醉
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.blackout.label: 昏醉不醒
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.label: 酒精耐受
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.description: 对酒精的长期耐受性。耐受性越严重，想达到和之前同样的效果所需要的酒精也就越多。
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.small.label: 弱
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.large.label: 强
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.massive.label: 极强
LanguageData.Hangover.label: 宿醉
LanguageData.Hangover.description: 一种令人不快的酒精中毒后的中枢神经系统功能紊乱状态。
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.slight.label: 轻微
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.strong.label: 强烈
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.pounding.label: 头痛欲裂
